channel.title: Fun on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: Adobe Firefly
item.description: Experiment, imagine, and create an infinite range of images with Firefly, generative AI-powered content creation from Adobe.

item.title: Prompt Engineering Guide
item.description: Guides on prompt engineering to get the best out of the Large Language Models.

item.title: MyLabBook
item.description: An open source research platform or ELN based on WordPress and the FAIR Data Toolkit that is Sustainable, Affordable, FAIR, and Easy.

item.title: dimensions.ai
item.description: With Dimensions, you have free access to a vast collection of curated research outputs and tools that help you source exactly what you need to advance your own discoveries.

item.title: Modern Lab Community
item.description: Community for researchers to share best practices.

item.title: Coolors
item.description: Nice tool to select color palette/theme for figure plotting and/or design

item.title: Gitmind
item.description: Free, online mindmapping and flow charts

item.title: Sighchology Research Lab | 星礼研究所
item.description: In this game, you play as a student in the Sighchology Research Lab. In this dark place, you do research every night and day without sleep, because you have been given a great mission: to publish a piece of paper.

item.title: Principia: Master of Science
item.description: Principia: Master of Science is a simulation game with the theme of European science in 17th century. Choose one of 12 real scientists from the era of Isaac Newton and proceed with your research. It is a time when even the term “Science” did not exist. Who can be the master of science?

item.title: Biorender
item.description: a powerful tool to draw scientific illustrations

item.title: Phylopic
item.description: Free silhouette images of animals, plants, and other life forms, available for reuse under a Public Domain or Creative Commons license.

item.title: MAST: Barbara A. Mikulski Archive for Space Telescopes
item.description: MAST: Barbara A. Mikulski Archive for Space Telescopes

item.title: new MAST: Barbara A. Mikulski Archive for Space Telescopes
item.description: MAST: Barbara A. Mikulski Archive for Space Telescopes

item.title: Wolfram Alpha
item.description: Wolfram Alpha is an AI assistant that does data analysis in a smart way.

item.title: Desmos
item.description: Desmos is a simple online charting tool that creates interactive charts.

item.title: Graph.tk
item.description: Graph.tk is a dead simple online charting tool that creates interactive charts.
